About Me

Let me tell you a few things...

BIO

Hello there! My name is Ankit Patel and you've stumbled upon my small corner of the internet. That's awesome!

I'm currently in the second year of a B.Sc. in Information Technology degree, and always looking for ways to actively apply what I have learned.

What do I do? Feel free to browse around to see the things I've built, and to learn more about me! Like my work? Get in touch.
